When the Katana's item level becomes 8, it automatically gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{Flaming} rune, which automatically upgrades to a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RSZwUlCzUX7Nb4UA]{Flaming (Greater)} rune when its item level becomes 15. It's fundamental runes also upgrade when the item reaches the appropriate levels: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.pOoEiuEuITm4I2Il]{Weapon Potency (+2)} at 10th level, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.KCQRFvUgbyclvOGi]{Striking (Greater)} at 12th, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rvItjGQaYT7Luwtm]{Weapon Potency (+3)} at 16th, and finally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.woxl2FrrgAcJDu0t]{Striking (Major)} at 19th level.

Lucky Staff of Protective Souls.name: Lucky Staff of Protective Souls
Lucky Staff of Protective Souls.description:
This wooden staff is remarkably sturdy and unyielding. While wielding the staff, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your DC to avoid being shoved or tripped. The sound of lost souls can be heard from it if listend closely enough.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.TVKNbcgTee19PXZR]{Shield}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.4WAib3GichxLjp5p]{Alarm}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.aAbfKn8maGjJjk2W]{Mystic Armor}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5esP2GVzvxWsMgaX]{Environmental Endurance}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fr58LDSrbndgld9n]{Resist Energy}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
Lucky Staff of Protective Souls.gmNote:
Aspects luck, soul
